name: Rise of Nations Gold Edition
description:
Rise of Nations: Gold Edition gives you the greatest strategic game experience as you you lead your armies on land or sea. This version gives you both the award-winning original title and the critically acclaimed expansion pack, Rise of Nations: Thrones and Patriots.

Features

    Lead one of 24 highly diverse nations
    With the Gold Edition, you can lead any of 24 nations in a single-player campaign or on a multiplayer battlefield.

    Huge array of campaigns and scenarios
    Non-linear, single-player campaigns based on historical epochs will keep you busy as you plan your moves on the strategic outer map and play out battles in over 130 scenarios.

    Command over 240 different units
    Lead your armies on land or sea or in the air with slingers, musketeers, tanks, massive Persian War elephants, aircraft carriers, and nuclear missiles.

    In-depth game experience
    Create a truly strategic game experience by using national borders, flank attacks, spies, and generals.
